fields.title: matrix multiplication
fields.pointers:
* Common operations on matrices include:
**  [matrix inverse](matrix_inverse) , which is useful for  [solving systems of linear equations](linear_systems_as_matrices)
**  [eigenvalues](eigenvalues_and_eigenvectors) , a central concept in many areas of science and engineering 
** the  [singular value decomposition](singular_value_decomposition) , a canonical representation of matrices closely related to eigenvalues 
* Many properties of matrix multiplication can be generalized to  [linear operators on vector spaces](linear_operators) .
fields.summary: Matrix multiplication is an operator on matrices which satisfies many of the properties of multiplication, although not commutativity.
